Name: Mercenaries
Description: Mercenaries and Soldiers of Fortune are the Inner Sphere main stay of Military Assets. Hired Muscle, expendable and cheap.
ReputationStatements: I'd prefer to be working for a paying client, but sometimes we get jobs we just can't refuse, Commander.

MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, Commander. You made the best of a bad situation. Here's hoping we don't run into another job like that one.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: You win some, you lose some. Sometimes it's in between. I'm disappointed we couldn't complete the contract, but at least we gave it our best shot.
BadFaithFailureStatements: That was an utter catastrophe, Commander. We can't afford failures like that.
